ext_descriptions.ext_description: A day_in_week_number is the position of a specified day in a week.
The value of the integer number shall be between 1 to 7.
A day_in_year_number is the position of a specified day in a year.
The value of the integer number shall be between 1 to 366.
A week_in_year_number is the position of a specified week in a year.
The value of the integer number shall be between 1 to 53.
